data provided by Paul Lucey in 2006
derived using techniques of Lucey 1998
Forsterite, Fo= 90.8000
minimum grain size (microns)= 45.0000
maximum grain size=(microns) 90.0000
column 1= wavelength, micrometers
column 2= real index
column 3= imaginary index
